title: RP Hextech Chests + Refund
body:
I recently bought two packages of the "Hextech Chests"  10 + 1 package deals. 

I finished the first set of boxes (10) and bought my second set.

Clicking "open 10", I proceeded to open six boxes, then receive a skin I really liked. In my excitement, I accidentally scrolled over and clicked "Play", which brought me back to the lobby. 

Thinking it was no big deal, I reopened the "Loot" section of the client, only to my horror, see that instead of 6 boxes to open (10 - 4), I instead only had the two "free" boxes left to open with keys I craft myself.

Thus, I am missing a total of 4 hextech boxes I never got to open.

Is there a way to check + refund this portion of the purchase? I am extremely annoyed because the first 3 boxes were your typical champion shards, but the last 4 are always epic/legendary skins with a high chance.

Thank you.

replies.body:
First off I wanted to clear this misconception up; opening multiple boxes one after another does *not* increase the chance of getting epic/legendary skins. The drop chance is exactly the same for each chest. 

After looking through your recent Hextech Crafting history, it looks like you were able to open all 20 of those chests back to back. If you're concerned about what you got from the chests, hit us up in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and we can give you the list of what you got from those chests.
